sentences.en: A formal contract is signed which is renewable annually.
sentences.cn: 正式签订了每年可续签的合同。

sentences.en: An estimated 1600 vessels pass through the strait annually.
sentences.cn: 估计每年有1，600艘船通过该海峡。

sentences.en: As the main EU paymaster, Germany contributes £8 billion annually more than it gets back from Brussels.
sentences.cn: 作为欧盟的大老板，德国每年要出资80亿英镑，比它从欧盟得到的要多。

sentences.en: El Salvador produces 100,000 tons of refined copper annually.
sentences.cn: 萨尔瓦多每年生产10万吨纯铜。

sentences.en: Holiday World hires 300 new employees annually.
sentences.cn: 假日世界每年雇佣300名新员工。

sentences.en: Many migratory birds visit this lake annually.
sentences.cn: 许多候鸟每年到这个湖上作短期逗留.

sentences.en: Millions of tons of ammonia are consumed annually in agriculture.
sentences.cn: 在农业上每年要消耗成千上万吨的氨.

sentences.en: Seven million doses of vaccine are annually given to British children.
sentences.cn: 英国孩子每年要接种7百万剂疫苗。

sentences.en: The breeding herds annually produce and sell a crop of calves.
sentences.cn: 繁殖牛场每年生产和售出大批犊牛.

sentences.en: The demand for transplantable organs is rising about 15 percent annually.
sentences.cn: 每年需要移植器官的人又以约百分之十五的速度递增.
这个展览每年举行一次。

sentences.en: The prices of milk and cereals are fixed annually.
sentences.cn: 牛奶和谷类食物的价格每年确定一次。

sentences.en: The society publish its list of member annually.
sentences.cn: 该协会每年出版其会员名单。

sentences.en: They celebrate their wedding anniversary annually.
sentences.cn: 他们每年庆祝一番结婚纪念日.

sentences.en: This is a perennating rhizome from which flowering shoots arise annually.
sentences.cn: 这是一种每年发芽开花的多年生根茎。

trans.tran_cn: 每年，每年一次，一年一度
